welcome.title: Welcome to Head2Head!
welcome.description: This is your personal dashboard where you can track your progress, view stats, and find new battles.

mobile.description: Welcome to your mobile dashboard! Here you can track your progress and find new battles on the go.

userAvatar.title: Your Profile
userAvatar.description: Click your avatar to access your profile settings, notifications, and account preferences.

navigation.title: Navigate Like a Pro üß≠
navigation.description: Access all platform sections: Dashboard (home), Battles (compete), Leaderboard (rankings), Selection (find opponents), and Trainings (practice).

overviewProfile.title: Profile Overview
overviewProfile.description: Your public profile shows your achievements and ranking to other players.

recentBattles.title: Recent Battles
recentBattles.description: Review your latest battles, scores, and opponents.

mobile.description: Check out your latest battles and scores.

battleHistoryContent.title: Your Battle History ‚öîÔ∏è
battleHistoryContent.description: See all your completed battles with opponents, sports played, match results, and scores. Each battle shows who you fought, what sport, and whether you won, lost, or drew.

battleStatsContent.title: Detailed Battle Statistics üìä
battleStatsContent.description: Track your competitive performance: total battles fought, wins achieved, win rate percentage, and current winning streak. Perfect for monitoring your improvement!

friendsListContent.title: Your Friends List üë•
friendsListContent.description: View all your friends with their avatars, usernames, and ranks. Click on any friend to visit their profile, challenge them to battles, or see their achievements.

onboarding.battleArenaDesc: This is your competitive arena! Here you can create and join real-time sports trivia battles against players worldwide. Let's explore how to dominate the competition!
onboarding.howBattlesWorkDesc: Head-to-head trivia competition where speed and accuracy matter! Answer questions faster and more accurately than your opponent to win ranking points.
onboarding.createFirstBattleDesc: Set up your battle challenge here! Choose your sport and difficulty level. Once created, your battle becomes visible to all players who can join and compete.
onboarding.chooseYourSportDesc: Select from Football, Basketball, Tennis, and more! Each sport offers unique trivia covering rules, history, famous players, and current statistics.
onboarding.pickChallengeLevelDesc: Easy (beginners), Medium (casual fans), or Hard (experts). Higher difficulty levels give more ranking points but require deeper sports knowledge!
onboarding.launchYourBattleDesc: Click to create your battle! You'll enter a waiting room where you can invite friends or wait for random opponents. Battles start automatically when someone joins.
onboarding.joinExistingBattlesDesc: Browse all available battles created by other players. Click any battle to instantly join and start competing! The list updates automatically.
onboarding.battleActionsManagementDesc: Join battles (green button) or Cancel your own battles (red button). You can have up to 3 active battles waiting. Choose wisely!
onboarding.stayUpdatedDesc: Click refresh to manually update the battle list, though it updates automatically. Perfect for ensuring you see the latest available battles!

ui.topPlayersRanked: Top players ranked by points (wins, win rate, streaks, and consistency)
ui.creator: Creator
ui.createFirstBattleToSee: Create your first battle to see it here!
ui.battleCreatedSuccessfully: Battle created successfully! Redirecting to waiting room...
ui.upTo3ActiveBattles: You can have up to 3 active battles waiting. Please wait for someone to join or cancel some battles first.
ui.battleWaiting: battle waiting. Please wait for someone to join or cancel it first.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Head2Head

whatIsHead2Head.question: What is Head2Head?
whatIsHead2Head.answer: Head2Head is a real-time sports trivia platform where you can challenge friends and players worldwide to test your sports knowledge. Compete in various battle modes and climb the leaderboards!

tournaments.question: When are tournaments held?
tournaments.answer: After 1000 users, we will start holding tournaments. We will announce the date and time of the tournaments on the website.

isFree.question: Is it free to play?
isFree.answer: Yes, Head2Head is completely free to play! We offer various features and battle modes at no cost. Premium features may be added in the future.

mobileApp.question: Does platform have a mobile app?
mobileApp.answer: No, we don't have a mobile app yet. But we are working on it and it will be available soon.

contact.question: How can I contact head2head?
contact.answer: You can contact us at support@head2head.com
